Texts.Chs: 把^orange;再生基因^reset;带给这黄色的翼族人。(位于^orange;科学前哨站^reset;)
Texts.Eng: Bring a ^orange;Regenerative^reset; gene to the yellow Avian at the ^orange;Science Outpost^reset;

Texts.Chs: 我的^orange;基因提取设备^reset;坏掉了，我现在急需1份^green;再生基因^reset;来完成工作然后参加研讨会，你能帮帮我吗？
Texts.Eng: My ^orange;Xeno Lab^reset; is on the fritz and I need 1 ^orange;Regenerative^reset; gene to complete my work and get it ready for an event! Can you help me out?

Texts.Chs: 非常感谢你，有了你的帮助研讨会一定会大获成功！作为感谢，请拿着这个^green;凶残谋杀指南^reset;！嗯，一份食谱而已。
Texts.Eng: Thanks to you, the symposium will be a success! As gratitude, have this ^green;instrument of brutal and calculated murder^reset;! Well, the recipe anyways.
